front.title: A Binary Floor Control Protocol (BFCP) Control Package for the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: This document defines a Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Control Package for BFCP-based conference moderation. The control of Media Servers and their related resources in decomposed network architectures plays an important role in various Next Generation Networks. This Control Package aims at adding BFCP functionality to conferences using the SIP Control Framework.
